Title: UX Designer  E-Mobility  Digital Transformation
Section_0: Join Us in Powering the Future of E-Mobility!
Section_1: Are you passionate about user experience and eager to shape the future of sustainable energy? Do you thrive in a dynamic, fast-paced environment where your work directly impacts real-world innovation? Vattenfall is on a mission to accelerate the digital transformation of e-mobility, and we are looking for a UX Designer to help us drive this change.

Section_3: Vattenfall is one of Europes leading energy companies, committed to a fossil-free future. Our E-Mobility  UX team plays a key role in this mission, designing intuitive and intelligent user experiences for electric vehicle charging networks, smart grids, and digital energy solutions. Join us in shaping the future of clean energy!

Section_5: As a UX Designer, you will be at the forefront of creating exceptional user experiences that drive innovation in the e-mobility sector. You will collaborate with experts across multiple disciplines to design, optimize, and enhance digital solutions, ensuring they are user-friendly, efficient, and aligned with business objectives.

Als Strategisch Inkoper focus je op stadwarmte en energie opwek locaties (Business Unit Heat).
